page.title: 05New Milton Survey
page.content: As part of our Domesday Project work we carried out a survey of people's attitudes towards{New Milton.}We found that most people liked living in the area and would recommend it to other people.However,some found{New Milton} too busy and said that there were too many elderly people.Most people we spoke to thought that{New Milton}was big enough and disliked the idea of more building in the area.Nearly eveyone we spoke to was satisfied with the range of shops in the area and thought that the car parking provision was good.They thought that the area was quite well served by amenities but that there were not enough amenities providing entertainment,especially for the young.Most people felt that they should be more play facilities for children.
